MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL53 postcode area of Pwllheli, affecting properties in Edern and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:33PM on 22nd November 2020.
